title: Averrhoa carambola
Vernacular name: English- Star fruit </br> Hindi- Karmaal </br> Gujarati- Kamrakh </br> Sanskrit- Kamaranga </br>
Chemical Constituents: citric acid, tartaric acid, and oxalic acid
Therapeutic uses: Acts as a laxative and is used in traditional medicine against fever, skin disorders, high blood pressure, and diabetes
